attributes.review: this is a terrible app! i was looking at my hot anime boys photos and then suddenly the app downloaded and my phone crashed! it went to turn it on and the charge was at -69% so i plugged it in and suddenly it said TRUMP2020! i immediately started crying because i just wanted to watch anime and and this app took that away from me ! i had to buy a WHOLE NEW PHONE ! the app is terrible and takes away from my beautiful anime boy time and i would just tell all of you to not get it unless you want your hot anime boys to get glitched out and not be able to see them anymore. -666/10 do not recommend.
attributes.title: -666/10 do not recommend
